Token.Abstract: Represents the DynamoDB Streams configuration for a table in DynamoDB.
Indicates whether DynamoDB Streams is enabled (true) or disabled (false) on the table.
Indicates whether DynamoDB Streams is enabled (true) or disabled (false) on the table.
Indicates whether DynamoDB Streams is enabled (true) or disabled (false) on the table.

The DynamoDB Streams settings for the table. These settings consist of:

  • StreamEnabled - Indicates whether DynamoDB Streams is enabled (true) or disabled (false) on the table.

  • StreamViewType - When an item in the table is modified, StreamViewType determines what information is written to the stream for this table. Valid values for StreamViewType are:

    • KEYSONLY - Only the key attributes of the modified item are written to the stream.

    • NEWIMAGE - The entire item, as it appears after it was modified, is written to the stream.

    • OLDIMAGE - The entire item, as it appeared before it was modified, is written to the stream.

    • NEWANDOLDIMAGES - Both the new and the old item images of the item are written to the stream.

    • NEWIMAGE - The entire item, as it appears after it was modified, is written to the stream.

    • OLDIMAGE - The entire item, as it appeared before it was modified, is written to the stream.

    • NEWANDOLDIMAGES - Both the new and the old item images of the item are written to the stream.
